titleStmt.title: House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

body.p: One chamber of the Legislative Branch of the Commonwealth of Kentucky. Comprised of 100 Representatives.

ab.bibl: Robert M. Ireland, The Kentucky State Constitution: A Reference Guide (Westport, Conn.: Greenwood Press, 1999); Kentucky Constitution. Accessed February 17, 2017. (http://www.lrc.state.ky.us/legresou/constitu/intro.htm).
